H0.text: Who played Hotlips Houlihan in the 1972 film MASH. Jane Fonda

H1.text: Who played Hotlips Houlihan in the 1972 film MASH. Goldie Hawn

H2.text: Who played Hotlips Houlihan in the 1972 film MASH. Barbara Streisand

H3.text: Who played Hotlips Houlihan in the 1972 film MASH. Sally Kellerman

A4.text: Her role as Major Margaret 'Hot Lips' Houlihan in Robert Altman's film M*A*S*H (1970) earned her an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress.
